availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John T. Aud (Shelby County, Kentucky, master carpenter and 2nd lieut Shelby Co State Guard)

body.p: Shelby County, Kentucky, master carpenter and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Eleanor R. Young Aud in Shelby County on April 13, 1852. Father of R. T. Aud, Adelia C. Aud, Ella C. Aud, and Julia M. Aud. Master carpenter in Shelby County in 1860. Served in the Shelby County State Guard (U.S.A.) as a second lieutenant from September 1, 1862, to November 1, 1862.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Shelby, District 1, p. 171-72.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 856.
